name: Bone Katana "Wolf"
description: Improved Long Sword built on a bone base. Top edge is covered in monster fangs.

name: Iron Katana
description: Made with technology from the Orient. A strong Sword, but requires maintenance.

name: Large Bone
description: A normal bone sharpened into a Long Sword. Above reproach as a practice weapon.

name: Blango Destroyer
description: Long Sword made from Blango materials. Liberally uses cold resistant fur.

name: Iron Katana "Grace"
description: Made with technology from the Orient. A strong Sword, but requires maintenance.

name: Iron Katana "Gospel"
description: Made with technology from the Orient. A strong Sword, but requires maintenance.

name: Bone Katana "Shark"
description: Improved Long Sword built on a bone base. Top edge is covered in monster fangs.

description: Improved Long Sword built on a bone base. Top edge is covered in monster fangs.

name: Blango Destroyer+
description: Long Sword made from Blango materials. Liberally uses cold resistant fur.

name: Eager Cleaver
description: A beautiful blade forged by an aimless wanderer from the Orient who soon disappeared.

name: Dark Scythe
description: A sickle shaped death Scythe that can cut a wyvern in two. Treated material.

name: Crimson Scythe
description: Scythe made from the pride of a Monoblos, its blood red horn. Never breaks twice.

name: Wyvern Blade "Fall"
description: Wyvern Blade draped in the colors of Autumn. One stroke causes an explosion of fire.

name: Wyvern Blade "Leaf"
description: Dark green blade made from Rathian material. Incredibly sharp and powerful.

name: Black Katana Mk.I
description: Chemically treated bone katana made using razorsharp hornetaur materials

name: Blango Decimator
description: Long Sword made of Blangonga materials. Its cold blade freezes all that approach.

name: Devil Slicer
description: A beautiful blade forged by an aimless wanderer from the Orient who soon disappeared.

name: Tormentor
description: A sickle shaped death Scythe that can cut a wyvern in two. Treated material.

name: Monoblos Scythe
description: Scythe made from the pride of a Monoblos, its blood red horn. Never breaks twice.

name: White Mantis
description: White Scythe made with a silver horn. It glitters like a new moon.

name: Black Katana Mk.II
description: Chemically treated Bone Katana made using razor-sharp Hornetaur materials.

name: Saber
description: Dragon Blade with the power of Lunastra. Opponents will immolate in a blue blaze.

name: Mirage Finsword
description: Chameleos-like invisible sword, good for hit jobs. Requires Guild's OK to own.

name: Supremacy Blade
description: There is nothing that can stand up to this famous blade.

name: Fire Dragonsword
description: Made from Lao-Shan's Horn and Firestone. A treasure. One of the dragon-killers.

name: Red Dragonsword
description: Made from Lao-Shan's Horn and Firestone. A treasure. One of the dragon-killers.

name: Wyvern Blade "Blood"
description: One swipe of this Long Sword's crimson blade can unleash a baptism by fire.

name: Wyvern Blade "Verde"
description: Dark Green Blade Made from Rathian Materials. Incredibly Sharp And Powerful.

name: Guardian Sword
description: Replica of a Sword made during the Guild's genesis. Given to those with dignity.

name: Rusty Claymore
description: Hybrid created from Rathalos and Kushala Daora materials. Its cut is a death sentence.

name: Crab Cutter
description: Splendid Scythe made from a Daimyo's claw. The giant claw's gap devours meat.

name: Scythe of Menace
description: A sickle shaped death Scythe that can cut a wyvern in two. Treated material.

description: Chemically treated Bone Katana made using razor-sharp Hornetaur materials.

description: Dragon Blade with the power of Lunastra. Opponents will immolate in a blue blaze.

description: Dragon Blade with the power of Lunastra. Opponents will immolate in a blue blaze.

name: Mirage Finsword+
description: Chameleos-like invisible sword, good for hit jobs. Requires Guild's OK to own.

name: Divine Slasher
description: A legendary Sword said to have the power to defeat even gods.

name: Smolder Dragonsword
description: Able to fell a wyvern in a single stroke. It is said to be detested by the beasts.

name: Fanatic Dragonwd LS
description: Legendary Dragonwood Sword, "Only wood has a soul that lasts longer than a dragon."

name: Fatalis Sickle
description: A life-reaping scythe. The wounds inflicted never heal and remain raw for decades.

name: Susano Blade
description: Ancient blade only given out by Guild elders. Holds the soul of a dragon killer.

name: Liquid Fire Blade
description: Lavasioth Long Sword. Sharp and strong; breaks through rock like a torrent of lava.

name: Aqua Guardian
description: Advanced water Long Sword. Crafting technique found in ancient sunken ruins.

name: Atlantica
description: Advanced water Long Sword. Crafting technique found in sunken ruins.

name: Edelweiss Ice Blade
description: A Longsword crafted using ancient eastern techniques.Fills the air with an icy chill.

name: Edelweiss Ice Blade+
description: Forged through legendary Eastern techniques, it fills the air with ice-cold winds.

name: C.Blango Decimator
description: Beloved sword of head desert horseman who sought fame. Sand dances with each swing.

name: Daito Crow
description: It is said that the swordsman was lonely by strength, but the sword was lonely by loss.

name: Hermitaur Slicer
description: Destructive scythe of sturdy Daimyo shell. Its power is due to advances in crafting.

name: Hermitaur Slasher
description: Destructive scythe of sturdy Daimyo shell. Its power is due to advance in crafting

name: Shogun Cutter
description: A Shogun Ceanataur scythe. Normally sheathed, its power shines when needed

name: Wailing Cleaver
description: Sword of regret and hope. A swordsman drunk on power, felled by a disciple.

name: Big Menacing Scythe
description: Laced with poisons created in absolute secrecy, this is a weapon for assassination.

name: WyvernBlade"Silver"
description: A cool blade that heats you to the core. Beauty and violence all in one sword.

name: Lost Black Katana
description: Legends say that by merely landing on its supreme edge a bug will be cut in two.

description: Legends say that by merely landing on its supreme edge a bug will be cut in two.
